summary: This is an email chain between attorneys regarding a letter about Ghislaine Maxwell's discovery and prison conditions. It shows legal team coordination on Maxwell's case in September 2020.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney who sent the initial email with an attached letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell, and is addressed in the reply.

events.title: Letter to Government Regarding Maxwell
events.description: Christian Everdell sends a letter to the government regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's discovery and prison conditions.

events.title: Legal Team Call Coordination
events.description: A reply email coordinates a call among the legal team to discuss matters related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain among Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorneys in September 2020.
It references an attached letter to the government regarding Maxwell's discovery and prison conditions.
The legal team includes Christian Everdell, Mark S. Cohen, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and comes from the law firm Cohen & Gresser LLP.
The email shows active legal defense efforts for Maxwell while she was in custody.
